name: Paroxetine

dosing.adult_acute: 20 mg once daily, may increase weekly
dosing.notes: Take in morning; CR formulation allows once-daily dosing; most anticholinergic SSRI

canadian_clinical.starting_dose: 10-20 mg once daily in the morning
canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Increase by 10 mg weekly based on response and tolerability
canadian_clinical.max_dose_practice: 60 mg/day; rarely exceed due to side effects
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Start 20 mg; can increase to 40 mg within 2 weeks
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 10-20 mg; titrate slowly; higher discontinuation syndrome risk - taper carefully

warnings: Black box warning: Increased suicidal thinking in children/adolescents/young adults
HIGHEST risk of discontinuation syndrome among SSRIs - requires slow taper
Strong CYP2D6 inhibitor - multiple drug interactions
Most anticholinergic SSRI - dry mouth, constipation, urinary retention
Weight gain more common than other SSRIs
Pregnancy Category D - avoid in pregnancy (cardiac malformations)

cautions.hepatic: Start 10 mg/day in severe hepatic impairment
cautions.pregnancy: Category D - avoid; associated with cardiac malformations; consider switching before conception
